EmailTemplate.subject: New IDC Report: The Rise of the Connected Experience
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Platforming for a Digital First World GAIN THE AGILITY YOU NEED TO OWN THE FUTURE ${CTAText} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Connected experiences from brands like Uber, Amazon and PayPal are redefining what consumers want from their financial institutions. Meanwhile:
- External parties are coming in to your formerly closed customer relationships - FinTechs keep injecting new ideas about using the data your financial institution owns - Customers in the future will pick any channel to interact—not just the financial institutions’
Increasingly, unlocking the agility to respond takes a smart middle office.
Read more in a new report “IDC: The Rise of the Connected Experience.” ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
